About NEARify
NEARify is an innovative application designed to help you connect with friends nearby using Bluetooth technology. Whether you\'re at an event, in a crowded space, or simply out and about, NEARify ensures you\'re always aware when your friends are close by. Key Features: - Seamless Bluetooth Discovery: Automatically detect nearby devices and establish connections. - Efficient Power Management: Operates in power-saving modes like Sniff Mode to optimize battery usage. - Real-Time Notifications: Instantly alerts you when a friend is within range.
How It Works: NEARify utilizes a two-step Bluetooth connection process: 1. Device Discovery: Finds nearby devices and retrieves their details. 2. Connection Establishment: Links with the detected devices to enable notifications and interactions.
